original: Melin, Birger Hjalmar, advokat, Göteborg, f. 25/4/89 i Skara ’av lärov:-adj., fil. lic. Teodor M. O’. Hulda Törn-quist. G. 22 m. Maja Rydelius. Barn: Ingvor f. 23, g. 46 m. ekon. .stud. Staffan Leffler, Jan 25, Hild 30. — Mog:-ex. i Skara 08, res:off:ex. 10, jur. kand. i Upps. 13. E. o. not. i Göta hovr. 13, tingstjg. i Askim^s, Hisings o. Sävedals hds doms. 13-16, tjg. i Svea hovr., fin:dep. samt ’Stat. hand:-o. ind :komm. 16-17, anst. å Friman & Garilander Adv:byrå i Gbg fr. 18, del-äg. i denna sed. 24. Ombudsman v. A-B Sv. Hand :bankens kont. i Gb^g 21-43. Led. av Sv:es adv:samf. sed. 20, -styr :-led. i dess Gbgsavd. (sederm. Västra avd.) 29-40, ’suppl. i samf. centralstyr. 34-36 o. led. 37-41. Löjtn. i Göta trängkårs res. 15. IdrGm.
translated: Melin, Birger Hjalmar, lawyer, Gothenburg, born on April 25th, 1889 in Skara. Son of a teacher: Teodor M. and Hulda Törnquist. Married on the 22nd with Maja Rydelius. Children: Ingvor, born in 1923, married in 1946 to economics student Staffan Leffler; Jan, born in 1925; Hild, born in 1930. Completed secondary school in Skara in 1908, reserve officer examination in 1910, law degree in Uppsala in 1913. Acting notary public in Göta Court of Appeal in 1913, court clerk in Askim's, Hisings, and Sävedal's district courts from 1913 to 1916, worked in Svea Court of Appeal, Ministry of Finance, and State Trade and Industrial Commission from 1916 to 1917. Employed at Friman & Garilander Law Firm in Gothenburg starting from 1918, became a co-owner in 1924. Representative for A-B Swedish Hand Bank's branch in Gothenburg from 1921 to 1943. Member of the Swedish Lawyer's Association since 1920, serving as a board member in its Gothenburg division (later the Western division) from 1929 to 1940, as a substitute member in the central board from 1934 to 1936, and as a board member from 1937 to 1941. Lieutenant in the reserve of the Gothenburg Logistic Corps since 1915. Involved in sports.
